result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason M Yonker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
The defendant is required to be monitored by the SCRAM patch through ADL Monitoring Solutions within 48 hours. The defendant is ordered to contact ADL at 920-283-1038 to make arrangements. The defendant is responsible for any costs associated with the SCRAM patch
Supervision fees
DNA Sample
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason M Yonker

records.addlTxt: Revoked - Sentenced to Time Served

11:03 AM Defendant Jason M Yonker in court, in custody.  Defendant's Attorney Jessica J Prado appears via audio visual zoom.  Attorney Mary M Sowinski in court for State of Wisconsin. Court goes over record and notes parties in receipt of Revocation Order and Warrant.  Atty Sowinski statement/Atty Prado statement/Defendant statement/Court statement.  

Court Statement

Jail: 64 days
Jail: 64 days Credit

Atty Sowinski statement to court regarding Case 22CF176 and notes that Atty Prado was been appointed to this case, but not other.  Atty Prado statement not sure why she was appointed to Felony case as she does not take felony cases and believes it is a mistake that she has been appointed and will be withdrawing from that case 22CF176.  Court statement that if defendant finds employment between now and Felony case that he may appear via zoom/telephonically and if not employed, he must appear in person. 

Cost converted to civil judgment, adj: 11:16 a.m.
Sentencing hearing on revocation on September 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.

from defendant regarding revocation (nothing filed yet)

2:59 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker not in court. Calling 22CF82, 22CF63, 22CF128, 22CM15, 22CM48, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. Court review of case. Defendant states has contacted PD's office - statement to charges/bond. Pfeifer objects to any bond modification. Court will take under advisement - bond continued. adj. 03:05 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

1:54 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary M. Sowinski in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker appeared by video, in custody. Calling 22CF128, 22CF63, 22CF82, 22CM15, 22CM48, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. 22CF128 set for an initial appearance. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - PD's office not able to appoint counsel yet in prior cases. Sowinski statement to bail - statement to prior charges. Defendant statement to Vilas/Oneida County charges. Court sets bond. adj. 02:03 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:06 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker not in court. Attorney Jessica J Prado appeared by video for Jason M Yonker. Calling 22CM15 & 22CM48. Prado representing on misdemeanor cases only. In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea. Bail continued. adj. 03:08 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:55 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker in court. Calling 22CF63, 22CF82, 22CM15, 22CM48, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. Court quashes warrant. Defendant states cab was running late and called JA. Court questions Defendant on address. Defendant states he does not have documentation on interview - will not give him anything. Court swears Defendant in. Defendant states he did not have an interview. Court directs Defendant not to obtain any new cases/be on time for all court appearances/do not lie. Bond continued. 03:01 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:49 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker not in court. Calling 22CF63, 22CF82, 22CM15, 21TR2477 & 21TR2478. Court review of case. Schiek requests warrant be authorized. Court authorizes warrant. adj. 02:51 PM

1:41 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason M Yonker in court. Calling 22CF63, 22CM15 & 22CM48. Defendant states PD's office is still searching for counsel. Defendant forgot to bring verification of interview - did not get the position. Court states Defendant needs to bring documentation at next hearing or will be placed into custody. Defendant statement to no contact. Bond continued. adj. 01:47 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:01 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jason M Yonker appeared by video, in custody. Calling 22CF63, 22CM15 & 22CM48. Court questions Defendant on address/employer where interview is at/parents address. Court sets signature bond. Defendant must bring letter from Hypro stating that he was at interview to next hearing. adj. 03:11 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Pfeifer/Defendant statement to bail. Court sets $500 signature bond in 22CM15 and $750 cash bond in 22CF63. Court sets bond. adj. 01:39 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
